    • Method Detail

      • detectLibraryPath

        public static void detectLibraryPath()
        Manipulates the class ClassLoader to include an additional directory in the search path for native libraries. The additional directory is constructed from the system properties "user.dir", "os.name" and "os.arch" and should hopefully contain the right native libraries for running JOGL on a specific platform. If the generated directory does not exist, an error message is printed to System.err and System.exit() is called.
